last_episode_to_air.name: Parking Lot Lesson
last_episode_to_air.overview: In a parking lot in Pascagoula, Mississippi, a customer in a wheelchair confronts another who he believes is blocking access to his wheelchair ramp.

name: Customer Wars
overview: With supply chain shortages, prices skyrocketing and more shoplifting than ever before, positive customer relations are nearly impossible. “Customer Wars” spotlights the conflicts that arise when disgruntled and irrational customers come face-to-face with the employees doing their best to take care of their needs. From fiery exchanges at the fast-food drive thru to loss-prevention brawls, this series proves once and for all that “The customer is always right” is the exception rather than the rule.
tagline: The customer is always right is the exception rather than the rule.

episodes.name: Everything Must Go
episodes.overview: A woman vandalizes a New Jersey convenience store by randomly sweeping items off the shelves; a rideshare driver in Florida is pushed to the brink by a rude and unsanitary rider.

episodes.name: Extra Special Delivery
episodes.overview: Customers brawl over an all you can eat crab legs buffet in Queens, NY. Trash talking between two groups of diners at a pancake house in Texas comes to blows. A man infuriates other customers when he cuts the long line at a coffee shop drive thru in Florida. A package delivery person attacks a woman who questions her methods.

episodes.name: The Last Straw
episodes.overview: A man in Florida attacks a fast food cashier apparently over a lack of available straws. A grounded passenger in Texas gets a serious comeuppance after slapping an airline employee. A man in a grocery store beats the manager with sausage allegedly for not allowing him to purchase beer. Two customers at a crowded North Carolina gas station get into an all-out brawl when one tries to cut in front of the other. A convenience store clerk in California must deal with an aggressive, hairy, 500 pound intruder seeking candy bars.

episodes.name: Slippery Customer
episodes.overview: Supermarket loss prevention officers try to wrangle an accused teenage shoplifter. The owner of a watch shop fights off two masked robbers. A woman attempting to buy alcohol at a pharmacy refuses to show her identification. Two phone store employees in Virginia deal with a violent customer attempting to force his way into the store.

episodes.name: You're Out!
episodes.overview: A delivery driver falls through a plate glass window at a New York pizza parlor; a concert goer in Toronto is accused of throwing a glass container at the stage; a robbery attempt in Texas is thwarted by quick thinking employees.

episodes.name: Full Moon Brawl
episodes.overview: One customer's kind gesture sparks an all-out brawl in a Florida convenience store; cops are called after shoppers duke it out over toilet paper; a retired police officer in California blocks an alleged shoplifter from leaving the parking lot.

episodes.name: Deli Derriere
episodes.overview: In a Michigan grocery store, a woman frustrated with the deli counter wait-time displays her derrière; fists fly at a luxury resort in Rio when one couple doesn't get their way; on a plane in Miami, a woman hits her husband with a laptop.

episodes.name: Shoplift Til You Drop
episodes.overview: A shoplifter takes on a security guard in Oregon; a brawl breaks out in a parking lot in Illinois as thousands of concert goers try to leave at once; an emergency room doctor's horrific bedside manner is caught on camera in California.

episodes.name: Beer Run
episodes.overview: A woman in Idaho tries to steal a chainsaw by stuffing it in her pants; disgusted customers watch a woman eat directly from the serving ladle at restaurant buffet; a teenager struggles to outrun security in California.

episodes.name: Haircut 911
episodes.overview: A customer fights a raging fire in a New Jersey superstore. A mother in Massachusetts calls 911 on her son's barber. Late-night brawlers in Maryland end up crashing through a store's window. A teen mother leaves her newborn baby with a customer at a New Jersey restaurant. In California, an elderly store owner fights back when his store is held up. A broken ride at a fair in Turkey sends a group of children hurtling through the air.

episodes.name: Fast Food Freakout
episodes.overview: At a fast food restaurant in Florida, a customer acts out after claiming to witness unclean behavior from an employee; a jewelry shop owner wrestles with a robber wielding a large knife; an angry customer pulls out a gun at a Utah drive-thru.

episodes.name: Baseball Brawl
episodes.overview: A man accused of cutting in line at a drive-thru has to contend with an angry local; a brawl breaks out at a baseball game in Philadelphia when a sports fan is blocked from leaving his row; a CEO in Arizona makes racist remarks to his driver.

episodes.name: Lip Service
episodes.overview: An Ohio customer fights fast food employees, apparently over a customized drink; a Scottish man has trouble ordering at an Alabama drive-thru; at a New York diner, a server tells off a customer.

episodes.name: Nail Salon Nightmare
episodes.overview: In Florida, a couple is booted from a flight after allegedly refusing to follow instructions; a young girl in California finds herself stuck in a gumball machine; a hatchet-wielding customer terrifies customers in a New York City restaurant.

episodes.name: No Backup Needed
episodes.overview: At a fast food restaurant in South Carolina, a man stands up to a customer and things become physical; when two rowdy spring breakers cause some trouble at a beach in Florida, a lone officer arrives and takes immediate control of the situation.

episodes.name: Rage Against the Rideshare Driver
episodes.overview: A stubborn moviegoer refuses to give up his seat, causing employees to stop the movie and intervene; a woman throws a tantrum after being ordered off a flight for not complying with the airline's pet policy.

episodes.name: Mid-Air Scare
episodes.overview: A plate shatters on a woman's face during a brawl over restaurant seating; a man wreaks havoc in a video game store over their return policy; a delivery driver falls into a 13-foot septic hole while attempting to deliver a package.

episodes.name: Courage on Tap
episodes.overview: A customer causes chaos with a fire extinguisher; a man renting out his luxury car for the day finds it at a body shop; a bar patron keeps his cool in the face of an armed robber; a supermarket customer starts arguing with the staff.

episodes.name: Didn't Nail It
episodes.overview: A Los Angeles woman confronts a nail technician over an alleged lazy manicure; a violent brawl erupts over a closed-off seating section at a restaurant chain in Texas; a man attacks a rideshare driver in Laveen, Ariz.

episodes.name: Cart Crusader
episodes.overview: An irate resident in Omaha, Neb., intentionally strides through freshly poured cement; in Miami, Fla., a disruptive passenger who refuses to switch seats on a commercial flight causes turbulence even before takeoff.

episodes.name: Chaos on the Conveyor Belt
episodes.overview: A woman demands a refund, allegedly after hearing Spanish at her local pizzeria; a donut shop customer hurls a pot of coffee at an employee during an argument over her order; a brawl breaks out among a group of tourists at a fast food restaurant.

episodes.name: Fast Food Frenzy
episodes.overview: A brawl erupts in a restaurant between employees and a customer; a car rental agent deals with a difficult customer; a delivery driver's car is stolen; a pro wrestler and a spectator come to blows; a utility worker is confronted by a property owner.

episodes.name: Brawl at the Mall
episodes.overview: Passengers try to vote a disruptive woman off a plane; a brawl breaks out after someone allegedly cuts the line; a woman's finger gets stuck in a cart; a customer risks his life to stop an armed robber; a heckler and a comic get in an argument.

episodes.name: Robot Run
episodes.overview: In Nashville, Tenn., a dissatisfied restaurant patron tests the tolerance of her fellow diners; a tech-savvy New Yorker sends his robot to fetch fish food, delighting a pet store employee.

episodes.name: A Rude Awakening
episodes.overview: In Brookhaven, Penn., a pizza delivery man helps police apprehend a suspect; in Philadelphia, a gas station customer rudely wakes up a napping cashier; a store clerk in Los Angeles risks her life to fight off a would-be robber.

episodes.name: Drama at the Drive Through
episodes.overview: In Swampscott, Mass; a woman and a contractor face off over noisy construction in her neighborhood; after reportedly being told it's too early to order a chicken product a woman attacks the employees through a drive-thru window.

episodes.name: Don't Mess With Grandma
episodes.overview: In Fort Lauderdale, Florida, tempers flare during a flight's deboarding process as an impulsive passenger attempts to force his way down the aisle. In Cherry Hill, New Jersey, a mall-goer's unique outlook on life stuns the man interviewing him. In Everett, Washington, three men attempting to rob a cannabis shop are met with an extremely effective deterrent. In England, a mother-daughter duo is shocked by their extreme eyebrow treatments. Tensions reach a boiling point in a San Francisco, California restaurant when a dissatisfied customer hurls a bottle of hand sanitizer toward a mother and child. A 25-person brawl erupts at a superstore in St. Louis, Missouri. A drive thru customer in Elkhart, Indiana, gets a huge surprise in his takeout bag.

episodes.name: Can't Fight this Ceiling
episodes.overview: In Las Vegas, a rideshare driver and passenger get into a heated altercation over an alleged door slam. In Akron, Ohio, a cashier lifts her shirt and flashes a customer mid-argument. A young lady in England throws a milkshake at a car she was just paid to wash. A woman falls through the ceiling of a convenience store in Canada. In Houston, Texas, a woman stands in a sports stadium parking space in an attempt to reserve her spot. In Knoxville, Tennessee, a passenger attempts to rob a Taxi driver at gunpoint. At a superstore in Alabama, a pregnant woman shopping with her husband shocks him with a special request.

episodes.name: Too Hot to Handle
episodes.overview: In Orlando, FL, a passenger makes a scene in the aisle after being asked to leave the plane; a pickup truck at a drive thru window suddenly becomes engulfed by flames.

episodes.name: Dumpster Dive
episodes.overview: In Oakland, California, a disagreement between two employees culminates in a dramatic tug of war with one employee's hair; at a Texas airport, a passenger goes on a tirade after being denied boarding.

episodes.name: Cruise Blues
episodes.overview: A fight breaks out at a restaurant in Miami, Fla., after employees throw cups at an allegedly disruptive customer; a man is accused of stealing the items he just purchased in a home goods store because he didn't take a receipt.

episodes.name: Baggage Claim Brawl
episodes.overview: In Norman, Oklahoma, a delivery driver goes all out in an attempt to find a customer's missing package; in Rye, N.Y., amusement park goers find themselves stuck on a malfunctioning ride that's spinning in reverse.

episodes.name: Foul-Mouthed Flier
episodes.overview: On a flight bound for Austin, TX, a passenger goes on a foul-mouthed tirade after being asked to watch his language. An apparently armed man strikes out at a nail salon in Georgia. An Alaskan woman visiting Brooklyn, NY rids a local bar of a large pest. A complaining customer in a California tire shop exasperates other customers, leading to a physical altercation. A missed stop on a city bus leads to a violent altercation between the bus driver and an older passenger.

episodes.name: Customer Support
episodes.overview: A hungry customer at a Florida restaurant draws the ire of other customers; Police confront a young man with a gun inside a Wisconsin Convenience store; purported seating kerfuffle escalates to an all out brawl.

episodes.name: Runway Rage
episodes.overview: In Philadelphia, a disruptive passenger is removed from an airplane; a fight breaks out at a local bar in Hill City, S.D.; football fans heading to a match in West Sussex, England race against the clock to receive a beer delivery.

episodes.name: Bar Blunder
episodes.overview: In Baltimore, a verbal argument between two groups of diners escalates when a man throws a drink in a woman's face; at a nail salon in Akron, Ohio, a complaining customer gets in a heated back and forth with a social media influencer.

episodes.name: Rideshare Rage
episodes.overview: In Parma, Ohio, a dissatisfied customer at a fast food restaurant throws her food at an employee; in the Bronx, N.Y., a rideshare passenger goes on a tirade apparently after learning that she can't charge her phone.

episodes.name: Suds and Spats
episodes.overview: A customer calls the police over a dryer dispute; a fast-food customer demanding a refund slaps an employee; an alligator wrestling show takes a terrifying turn; a dispute erupts when a man believes a woman is wrongfully parked in a handicap spot.

episodes.name: Con Catastrophe
episodes.overview: In a drug store in Malibu, an employee confronts a man about his service dog's behavior; police in Florida report to a big-box store and detain a woman who employees claim scanned numerous items at self-checkout and then left without paying.

episodes.name: Unhappy Customer
episodes.overview: Two passengers deal with flight delays in very different ways; in Groves, Texas, a carnival worker dangles from a ride 30 feet in the air while trying to keep a young rider safe; a good delivery worker in Ohio gives a customer a piece of his mind.

episodes.name: Escalator Escapade
episodes.overview: A woman takes issue with a mouse and spots in a restaurant; a suspected shoplifter goes to great lengths to avoid arrest;a fair ride goes terribly wrong; an argument over cold french fries turns physical.

episodes.name: Subway Scuffle
episodes.overview: In New York City, a bike on the subway starts a brawl; on a plane taxiing in Philadelphia, a desperate passenger threatens to relieve herself in the aisle; a festival ride in Traverse City, Mich., appears to malfunction.

episodes.name: Cool as a Cucumber
episodes.overview: In Seattle, a restaurant owner confronts a woman accused of trying to leave without paying her tab; a rideshare driver in Washington D.C. remains very cool under extreme pressure; in Hawaii, a self-proclaimed Shopping Cart Narc runs for cover.

episodes.name: It's All Downhill From Here
episodes.overview: In Albuquerque, N.M., a passenger's behaviour causes the crew to divert a flight; a downhill chase ensues in Park City, Utah, after a skier is called out for his rude behaviour on the slopes.

episodes.name: Emergency Exit
episodes.overview: A bus driver on the job in Las Vegas speaks his mind; in Atlanta, an altercation during the breakfast rush at a drive-thru escalates to a dangerous point; a zoo visitor in Indonesia gets up close and personal with an Orangutan.

episodes.name: High Anxiety
episodes.overview: At a pawn shop in Maine, two men reach an unlikely agreement about an allegedly ill gotten bicycle; in Florida, a drive-thru worker takes issue with a customer's allegedly noisy child; in Franklin, N.C., an animal clinic's day turns disastrous.

episodes.name: Argument in the Air
episodes.overview: A heated argument breaks out on a mid-air flight to Los Angeles. In Wisconsin, an alleged shoplifter leads police on a wild chase. At a sandwich shop in California, a woman takes drastic measures after reportedly being denied a refund. On the slopes in Austria, a struggling snowboarder takes down a slew of other skiers. Two friends find a clever workaround for the 'no pedestrians at the drive-thru' rule.

episodes.name: Just Plane Wrong
episodes.overview: Parents in Florence, Ky., find an unexpected and unpleasant surprise in their child's chicken nuggets; an overbooked flight in Chicago leads to the forced removal of an unwilling passenger.

episodes.name: Not a Dog Person
episodes.overview: In Delaware, a restaurant customer takes issue with the proximity of a man's service dog; in Minnesota, a customer loses control of his vehicle at a car wash; disappointment with a meal prize leads to blows in Nova Scotia.

episodes.name: Construction Crusaders
episodes.overview: In Bakersfield, Calif., a pair of heroic contractors helps a homeowner recover a bike taken from her yard; an angry customer in Bay Shore, Long Island blames a fast food restaurant for a fire in his microwave.

episodes.name: Drive-Thru Debacle
episodes.overview: In Augusta, Ga., disaster unfolds as a truck attempts to purchase food at a drive thru; at a Dallas airport, a passenger's rudeness sparks a chaotic brawl among travelers; in Melbourne, Australia, a rideshare driver gets a very pleasant surprise.

episodes.name: Homeowner vs. Handyman
episodes.overview: In Coram, N.Y., a homeowner confronts a handyman over his allegedly unsatisfactory work; in Oakland, Calif., a heated argument between two women on a train spins out of control; an alligator handler's routine in the Everglades goes very wrong.

episodes.name: Scuffle on the Slopes
episodes.overview: In Texas, an angry cell phone customer wreaks havoc in a store with a metal stool. A mistaken assumption creates an awkward situation for a food delivery worker in Maryland. In Florida, two telecommunication workers are confronted by an irate, and armed, resident. A demonstration at an Arkansas science museum goes very wrong. In Canada, a thrown snowball leads to a scuffle on the slopes. In Illinois, a package delivery worker refuses to let an icy driveway get in his way.

episodes.name: Delivery Disaster
episodes.overview: At an Atlanta Airport, a woman berates airline staff after apparently being removed from her flight. In Covington, Georgia, a delivery driver rushing to drop off a package makes a big mistake. A young boy dangles precariously from a chairlift at a Nevada ski resort as a group of skiers below attempt a rescue. At a coffee shop drive-thru in England, a woman convinces her boyfriend to order from a secret menu that doesn't exist. In Fort Worth, Texas, an attempted credit union robbery spirals dangerously out of control.

episodes.name: Convenience Store Chaos
episodes.overview: In Kansas City, Mo., a convenience store clerk and a customer get into a heated and prolonged confrontation; in North Carolina, two sibling whitewater rafting guides physically right each other on a raft as it makes it's way down a river.

episodes.name: Stadium Scramble
episodes.overview: In Lebanon, Ore., a pay-it-forward chain at a coffee shop drive-thru gets derailed when a customer is accused of cutting the line;

episodes.name: Public Transit Peril
episodes.overview: An employee of a Minnesota big box store confronts a customer about her receipt; an argument on a public bus in Houston takes a shocking turn when shots are fired.

episodes.name: Retail Rampage
episodes.overview: Two customers confront store employees about their meal at a sandwich shop; A man pays a serious price after trying to snatch a bus passenger's bag; A drugstore customer uses the store's milk to find relief after getting pepper sprayed.

episodes.name: Shopping Bag Shenanigans
episodes.overview: At a big box store in Encino, California, a customer fumes as an item she purchased is no longer in her shopping bag. In Saugus, Massachusetts, a man relaxing in the jacuzzi is shocked when he finds the gym has closed and he is now locked inside. At a Columbus, Mississippi hotel, an employee and a family attempting to check in argue over room availability. In Culcheth, England, a car barrels through a restaurant window, nearly missing a group of unsuspecting diners. In a parking lot in Lincoln, Nebraska, a man driving a skid loader results in a tense standoff with police.

episodes.name: Out of Order
episodes.overview: Tempers flare when a Los Angeles drive thru's cashless payment system goes down. In South Africa, a tour bus full of tourists take cover from an aggressive elephant. A woman in Indiana tells her father she wants to apply for one of the world's most dangerous jobs. A tornado rips through a car dealership in Trevose, Pennsylvania, with devastating consequences. A hot air balloon causes chaos when it crash lands at an outdoor festival in Missouri.

episodes.name: Boatside Brawl
episodes.overview: At a Dallas airport, confusion over seating on a plane ends with police intervention; a dispute over boat parking in Montgomery, Ala., leads to a huge brawl on the docks; a rideshare passenger in Chicago takes issue with a driver's dashcam.

episodes.name: Coffee Conundrum
episodes.overview: Spotlighting the conflicts that arise when disgruntled and irrational customers come face to face with the employees doing their best to take care of their needs.

episodes.name: Fast Food Fury
episodes.overview: At a fast food drive thru in Iowa, a customer's tone when trying to retrieve his debit card leads to a tense conflict with employees.

episodes.name: Haircut Heroes
episodes.overview: At a diner in Breaux Bridge, Louisiana, a canceled order leads to a confrontation between two customers and an employee. Two hammer-wielding robbers break into a London antique shop, in a brutal smash and grab robbery. In Ormond Beach, Florida, a homeowner and postal worker get into a screaming match over the scanning of a package. At a sandwich shop in Bowling Green, Kentucky, a young man brawls with employees and customers alike. In East Hartford, Connecticut, two barbers jump into action when they see a little girl running toward a busy intersection.

episodes.name: Passenger Pandemonium
episodes.overview: On a runway in Los Angeles, California, travelers get annoyed at a passenger who appears to be disruptive.

episodes.name: War of the Words
episodes.overview: On a bus in Maryland, a heated argument between two passengers escalates to a dangerous breaking point.

episodes.name: Shift Showdown
episodes.overview: At a convenience store in Reno, Nevada, a shift change between two employees escalates into a heated argument.

episodes.name: Parking Lot Lesson
episodes.overview: In a parking lot in Pascagoula, Mississippi, a customer in a wheelchair confronts another who he believes is blocking access to his wheelchair ramp.
